name: Jotaro's Bizzare Coffee Adventure
description:
Jotaro can't work with his dolphins without a good morning coffee. But what if something goes wrong?

Made for the JoJo Game Jam.

Controls: WASD to move, left mouse for using your ability, mouse wheel to choose your ability, right mouse to talk to people

Programming and art by me @FelixLs_

Music by @CaffeineOverdo2

Sound effects from JoJo's Bizzare Adventure and other online sources
